name: Crappy Cables
description:
Crappy Cables is a puzzle game about fixing breaks in a power cable by using a variety of adaptors. 

How does this fit the theme "Adapt"? 

  • Players use Adaptors to bridge gaps in a broken power cable.

How to Play:

  • Dragging Dot ends of adaptors towards ends make them click together
  • Left clicking  Line ends of adaptors while they are  connected disconnects them
  • Pressing Enter or Escape restarts game
  • F11 Toggles Fullscreen
  • Alt + F4 Closes game

Credits:

  • Hamish Oliver (HamishOliver) - Audio/Music/SoundEffects
  • Jared Bakker (Sugoi Yellow) - Graphics/Art/Programming/Design
